name: Satellite Dreamer: PERISH
description:
Satellite Dreamer: PERISH

Explore a satellite and navigate various room using a mix of weapons to enhance your movement. Fight three different bosses as you delve deeper into the vessel.

Features

  • 45+ Rooms to get through
  • 2 Weapons to find and exploit
  • 3 Bosses to defeat
  • 10 Cats to talk to
Controls

I would recommend playing full screen!

WASD/ARROWS to move
SPACE to jump
LEFT CLICK to fire your weapon
Q/E to switch weapons
M to view the map
ESC to pause

Credits

Art, Programming and Game Design: sam
Music: William Waldron
Font:  v3x3d
Sound Effects: shapeforms
